description: This file sets up a basic development server using Express. It provides a /health endpoint that returns a status of 'ok', and listens on a configurable port. It acts as a simple proxy and health check server for the frontend development environment, separate from the main Vite dev server.

methods.name: app.get('/health')
methods.description: Defines an endpoint to return JSON with status 'ok'.

methods.name: app.listen()
methods.description: Starts the Express server listening on the specified port and address, logging a message when ready.
